title: FianceeStart
body:
Fiancee: hello i am dill's Fiancee
Fiancee: I cant believe what happened
Fiancee: its awful
[[ good terms |goodterms]]
[[ when |when]]

title: goodterms
body:
Fiancee: yes but recently we had an argument
Fiancee: it wasnt bad enough for me to kill him! i would never do anything like that.

title: ButcherStart
body:
Butcher: I cant believe there's been a murder in our store!
Butcher: What horror! I really hope you solve it.
[[ what's in your hand |inhand]]
[[ when did you hear about the murder |whendidyouhear]]

title: inhand
body:
Butcher: In my hand? It's my trusty cleaver of course!
Butcher: Why do you ask?
[[ can i take a look at it? |takealook]]
[[ never mind. |nevermind]]

title: whendidyouhear
body: Butcher: Fiancee told me around 10 minutes ago.

title: takealook
body:
There is a faint smear of blood on the knife.
[[ take sample |takesample]]
[[ give back |giveback]]

title: takesample
body: The blood on the cleaver matches the victim's blood.
